text: Marc Evan Jackson (born August 21, 1970) is an American comedian and actor. He is best known for his work as Sparks Nevada in the Thrilling Adventure Hour, Kevin Cozner in Brooklyn Nine-Nine, Trevor Nelsson in Parks and Recreation, Dr. Murphy in 22 Jump Street, and Shawn in The Good Place. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Actors from Buffalo, New York Category:1970 births Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Comedians from New York (state)
title: Marc Evan Jackson
